refnamediv.refpurpose: Uncompresses the current Phar entry within the phar, if it is compressed

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.errors;
Throws BadMethodCallException if the phar.readonly INI variable is on, or if the bzip2/zlib extension is not available.
